title: Context-Free Grammar
description: In this Coding Challenge, I code a Context-Free Grammar text generator from scratch. The concept of recursion is explored. This video is part of Session 7 of the "Programming from A to Z" ITP class.

timestamps.title: Defining a JavaScript object containing the grammar rules
Creating a recursive algorithm to generate a random sentence
Creating a more intricate grammar structure using Allison Parish's examples
Summarizing and looking at other examples
